name: roda-empat-automotive
description: Build website catalog cars with scraping data using bun server and astro react js

scripts.dev: concurrently -n 'backend,frontend' -c '#007755,#2f6da3' 'cd apps/backend && bun dev' 'cd apps/frontend && bun dev'
scripts.build: concurrently -n 'backend,frontend' -c '#007755,#2f6da3' 'cd apps/backend && bun --bun run build' 'cd apps/frontend && bun --bun run build'
scripts.clean: concurrently -n 'backend,frontend' -c '#007755,#2f6da3' 'cd apps/backend && bun clean' 'cd apps/frontend && bun clean'
scripts.test: concurrently -n 'backend,frontend' -c '#007755,#2f6da3' 'cd apps/backend && bun test' 'cd apps/frontend && bun test'
